basic.blooming: Flowering period April-June, fruiting period June-September
basic.color: Flower color light blue, blue or blue purple

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, grows in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
